Package database

package database
  • Class
    Description
    Cell
    Represents a cell in a table, associated with a specific column.
    Column
    Represents a column in a database table, containing multiple cells and having a specific data type.
    ColumnType
    Enumeration representing the different types a column can have in a database.
    Database
    Represents a simple database system that manages tables and their columns and rows.
    Database.TableDataChangeListener
     
    Database.TableDesignChangeListener
     
    Database.TableNameChangeListener
     
    Row
    Represents a row in a table, containing a list of cells associated with columns.
    Table
    Represents a table in a database, containing multiple columns and rows.
